title: I Wore a Hollywood Disguise to Buy a PC - Scrapyard Wars 2024 Part 1
description:
https://jawa.link/LTTSYW24

Thanks to Jawa for sponsoring this season of Scrapyard Wars! They are THE marketplace for buying and selling gaming components, peripherals, and even fully assembled PCs. Their Scrapyard Wars giveaway is now closed, but you can still save BIG on your next PC upgrade, just like Linus and Luke did, by visiting the link above!

The reality competition series you asked for is back! And thanks to our sponsor Jawa, it's bigger than ever. Luke and Linus go head 2 head to build the ultimate gaming PC on a fixed budget, meaning they gotta be cheap with all their components, like GPU and CPU. Find the deals to claim the crown. But things never go as expected, do they?

Scrapyard Wars Giveaway - no purchase necessary. Valid 8/2/24 12:00am PT – 8/31/24 11:59pm PT. Residents of Canada and the US age of majority eligible for entry. Residents of Quebec, New York and Florida are not eligible. Total Twenty-Six (26) prizes across 4 contest periods. Odds depend on total entries received. Time-limited math skill-test question required. Go to 
https://lmg.gg/scrapwars24rules for no purchase entry and rules. 

Subscribe to Floatplane: https://lmg.gg/scrapwars24

Want more of Linus and the team? Floatplane is the only place to get early access to episodes, behind the scenes, extra content, exclusives and more. Subscribe today using the link above for 72 hour early access to all future episodes of this season of Scrapyard Wars. 

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1577320-i-wore-a-hollywood-disguise-to-buy-a-pc-scrapyard-wars-9-part-1/

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane
► GET A VPN: http://www.piavpn.com/linus
► SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS: https://lmg.gg/partners


CHAPTERS
---------------------------------------------------
0:00 Intro
0:40 The Rules
1:40 The Transformation Begins
2:35 Let's Start Shopping!
3:43 Team Luke Starts Scheming
4:41 Time to Keep Shopping
6:13 Meet the Judges
6:51 The First Big Find
7:47 Team Linus is Looking a Little Rough
9:01 Free.99?
12:04 Calling an Old Friend
12:50 Great Minds Think Alike
15:45 Cope or Hope?
17:02 Rule Bending
18:57 Elijah Shaves his Head
20:34 Costume Shopping
21:29 The Grand Reveal
23:06 Two Random Strangers Visit the Office
23:35 A Long Lost Reunion
24:09 Costume Shopping Pt. 2
24:58 The First Deal: Can They Pull it Off?
25:23 Teaser & Outro
